body.p: Clay County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Nancy Hibbard Pierce. Father of John H. Pierce, James Pierce, Margaret Pierce, Mary Permelia Pierce, Amelia Pierce, Fanny Pierce, and Frances Pierce. Farmer in Knox County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Clay County in 1860. Held one enslaved person in trust for [Unknown] [Unknown] in Clay County in 1860.
